attributes.action: Openly Support Israel against attacks from surrounding nations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Encourage Israel to stop giving any more land to Palestinians.  Back out of any peace deal that supports giving any land away that was given by Jehovah God to the Jews. Support Israel against any forms of attack from Iran and support Israel in any means to continue as a state

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
